quest: It is illegal for any person under the age of 16 to buy a Lottery ticket
quest_zh: It is illegal for any person under the age of 16 to buy a Lottery ticket

quest: Which language was spoken by people during the Iron Age?
quest_zh: 鐵器時代的人們說哪種語言？

quest: When Queen Anne died, a German, George of Hanover, became the next King of England
quest_zh: 當安妮女王去世時，德國人，漢諾威的喬治成為英格蘭的下一個國王

quest: It is a legal requirement that men and women should not be discriminated against due to their gender or marital status
quest_zh: 這是一個法律要求，男人和女人由於性別或婚姻狀況而不應受到歧視

quest: Which TWO are 20th century British inventions?
quest_zh: 20世紀的英國發明是哪兩個？

quest: What celebration takes place on the 25th of December each year?
quest_zh: 每年12月25日舉行什麼慶祝活動？

quest: The Archbishop of Canterbury is the spiritual leader of the Church of England
quest_zh: 坎特伯雷大主教是英格蘭教會的精神領袖

quest: Conservative Party is a political party in the UK
quest_zh: 保守黨是英國的一個政黨

quest: Which of these TWO lines from Shakespeare's plays and poems are often still quoted?
quest_zh: 莎士比亞的劇本和詩歌中的這兩條台詞中的哪一條經常被引用？

answers.answer: To be or not to be

quest: When are Pantomimes usually produced?
quest_zh: 啞劇通常什麼時候產生？

quest: Which TWO of these roles, in the UK, are unpaid?
quest_zh: 在英國，哪個角色中有哪個無薪？

quest: Mary Stuart, often now called Mary Queen of Scots was a Protestant
quest_zh: 瑪麗·斯圖爾特（Mary Stuart），現在通常被稱為蘇格蘭瑪麗女王（Mary Queen of Scots）是新教徒

quest: You need to be a member of a political party to be able to stand for election as an MP
quest_zh: 您需要成為政黨的成員，才能能夠作為國會議員選舉

quest: Which TWO of the following are examples of criminal law?
quest_zh: 以下哪個是刑法的例子？

answers.answer: Selling tobacco to anyone under the age of 18
answers.answer_zh: 向18歲以下的任何人出售菸草

quest: Which of these TWO countries are Commonwealth Members?
quest_zh: 這兩個國家中的哪個是英聯邦成員？

quest: The jury decides on the penalty if the defendant is found guilty
quest_zh: 陪審團決定罰款，如果被告有罪

quest: Members of the European Union can vote in all public UK elections
quest_zh: 歐盟的成員可以在所有英國公開選舉中投票

quest: What awards event celebrates British theatre?
quest_zh: 什麼獎項慶祝英國劇院？

quest: How many ski centres are there in Scotland?
quest_zh: 蘇格蘭有多少個滑雪中心？

quest: Which TWO of the following are major horse-racing events in the UK?
quest_zh: 以下哪項是英國的主要賽馬比賽？

quest: When was the Parliament of Northern Ireland first established?
quest_zh: 北愛爾蘭議會何時建立？

quest: When walking your dog in a public place, what must you ensure?
quest_zh: 當您的狗在公共場所帶走時，您必須確保什麼？

answers.answer: That your dog wears a collar showing the name and address of the owner
answers.answer_zh: 你的狗穿著一個衣領，顯示主人的名字和地址

answers.answer: That your dog does not come into contact with other dogs
answers.answer_zh: 你的狗沒有與其他狗接觸

answers.answer: That your dog never strays more than 3 metres away from you
answers.answer_zh: 你的狗永遠不會偏離距離你3米以上

answers.answer: That your dog wears a special dog coat
answers.answer_zh: 你的狗穿特殊的狗外套

quest: Which TWO of the following are protected by law from discrimination?
quest_zh: 以下兩個受法律保護不受歧視的保護？

quest: During Queen Elizabeth's reign the British Empire became the largest empire the world had ever seen
quest_zh: 在伊麗莎白女王統治期間，大英帝國成為世界上最大的帝國
